title: Verify ticket details are displayed correctly for a selected ticket
description: Ensure that when a user selects a ticket from the HPNow ticketing system, all relevant ticket details (ticket number, title, status, approval, due date, quantity, stage) are displayed accurately.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow system.
At least one ticket exists in the system.
steps: Select a ticket from the list (e.g., RITM3093710).
expected_result: The ticket details page displays the correct ticket number, title, status, approval, due date, quantity, and stage.

title: Verify workflow stage progression is visible for a ticket
description: Ensure that the workflow stages (Request Approved, Waiting for Approval, Fulfillment, Completed) are displayed with their current status (Approved, Completed, In Progress, Pending) for the selected ticket.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow system.
A ticket with multiple workflow stages exists.
steps: Select a ticket with multiple workflow stages.
expected_result: The workflow stages and their respective statuses are displayed in the correct sequence and with accurate status indicators.

title: Verify the Cancel button is visible and enabled for an open ticket
description: Ensure that the Cancel button is displayed and enabled for tickets that are in the 'Open' status.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow system.
expected_result: The Cancel button is visible and enabled for the selected ticket.

title: Verify activity stream displays ticket history and allows message input
description: Ensure that the activity stream on the ticket details page displays ticket history (e.g., creation event) and provides an input field for sending messages.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow system.
A ticket with activity history exists.
steps: Select a ticket with activity history.
expected_result: The activity stream displays ticket history and provides a message input field.

title: Verify navigation bar and user options are accessible
description: Ensure that the navigation bar (Home, Tickets, etc.) and user options (My Items, My Favorites, user profile) are visible and accessible from the ticket details page.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow system.
steps: Select any ticket to view its details.
expected_result: Navigation bar and user options are visible and accessible from the ticket details page.
